item.description:
IT'S JINGLE BELL TIME, IT'S A SWELL TIME TO JOIN THE PUGGIES MARCHING IN THE MIDDLEBORO CHRISTMAS PARADE!

Be sure to join us at the Middeboro Christmas Parade on Saturday, 11/28 (raindate, Sunday, 11/29) at 1:00. We'll gather at the Henry B Burkland School, 41 Mayflower Ave, Middleboro, MA starting at 12:30 so that we can get organized properly.

The Pugs should be dressed in Christmas coats, sweaters, or collars (antlers optional), and I'd like to see each Pug decorated with at least one non-breakable Christmas ornament, plus some jingle bells. Everyone bring jingle bells - nothing more fun than a pack of musical Christmas Pugs!

Shar is going to bring a wagon. We should probably have a couple of extra wagons for the old, slow Pugs. If you can bring a wagon, let us know! Don't forget to decorate your wagon!

We hope to see all of our Puggie friends and their people there!

group.name: The South of Boston Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The South of Boston Pugs March at the Middleboro Christmas Parade!
